name: Daiquiri
description: Originating from Cuba in the late 19th century, the Classic Daiquiri is a rum-based cocktail known for its simple yet captivating combination of sweet, sour, and spirit. Featuring a harmonious blend of white rum, fresh lime juice, and simple syrup, it provides a refreshing tropical allure. It is traditionally served in a chilled cocktail glass without any garnish, allowing the pure flavors to shine through. This cocktail is a testament to the potent beauty of minimalism in mixology.
instructions: In a shaker, combine ingredients with ice and shake well.
Strain the mix into a chilled cocktail glass.
